hooks.command: if [ -n "$FILE_PATH" ] && [[ "$FILE_PATH" == *.py ]]; then echo "[RUFF CHECK] $FILE_PATH"; uv run ruff check "$FILE_PATH" --no-fix || echo "[RUFF] Issues found in $FILE_PATH - run 'ruff check --fix' to auto-fix"; fi
if [ -n "$FILE_PATH" ] && [[ "$FILE_PATH" == *.py ]]; then uv run ruff format "$FILE_PATH"; fi
